description.@en: Most find it deeply ironic that Apostles take upon bludgeoning instruments to convert others to their faith. To an Apostle, bloodshed is ‘at least’ mitigated in this fashion, as their martial instrument of conversion serves as a grim reminder to not denigrate the faith.

effect.@en: You can only use weapons that are of the Brawling or Crushing types. Otherwise, you cannot use any of your Traits or Talents conferred by this Profession.
